query:
mutation WritePost(
    $title: String
    $body: String
    $tags: [String]
    $is_markdown: Boolean
    $is_temp: Boolean
    $is_private: Boolean
    $url_slug: String
    $thumbnail: String
    $meta: JSON
    $series_id: ID
    $token: String
  ) {
    writePost(
      title: $title
      body: $body
      tags: $tags
      is_markdown: $is_markdown
      is_temp: $is_temp
      is_private: $is_private
      url_slug: $url_slug
      thumbnail: $thumbnail
      meta: $meta
      series_id: $series_id
      token: $token
    ) {
      id
      user {
        id
        username
      }
      url_slug
    }
  }
